wordGroup: water droplet 水滴；微水滴，小水滴

sentences.en: temperature and water droplet distribution inside clouds;
sentences.cn: 捕捉云层内部温度和水滴的分布情况；

sentences.en: The pond has been changed forever because of that single, innocent droplet.
sentences.cn: 一滴天真无邪的水滴永远改变了整个池塘。

sentences.en: Transmission via droplet respiratory particles has also been documented.
sentences.cn: 还有记录表明，可通过呼吸道飞沫传播。
